Posts.Content: bdatlanta wrote: Just finished tx 4 today and my entire upper body is still very warm from radiation treatment. Its been 5 hours since radiation. Has this happened to anyone else? I'm also itchy on both arms. Have applied aloe and drinking fluids. This has happened after every rad treatment, but tonight is the worse. I go see my radiation onc. tomorrow as part of my weekly checkups. I thought rads s/e's were supposed to be a cakewalk versus chemo s/e's. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Upper Body hot and flushed after Rad treatment bdatlanta 4darmstrong
